Sentencas: The electrical and mechanical properties of Ni-YSZ cermet as the anode support of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) are determined by the metallic and ceramic components, respectively.
Titulo: Microstructural effects on the electrical and mechanical properties of Ni-YSZ cermet for SOFC anode

Sentencas: We used YSZ and NiO commercial powders of the average particle size from 1 to 10 mu m to fabricate Ni-YSZ cermets with different microstructures.
Titulo: Microstructural effects on the electrical and mechanical properties of Ni-YSZ cermet for SOFC anode

Sentencas: The porosity of the cermets was also modified by the amount of carbon black addition.
Titulo: Microstructural effects on the electrical and mechanical properties of Ni-YSZ cermet for SOFC anode

Sentencas: The distribution of each phase of cermets was analyzed with scanning electron microscopy combined with energy dispersive spectroscopy.
Titulo: Microstructural effects on the electrical and mechanical properties of Ni-YSZ cermet for SOFC anode

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity and fracture strength of the Ni-YSZ cermets were investigated and interpreted in a view of percolation phenomena.
Titulo: Microstructural effects on the electrical and mechanical properties of Ni-YSZ cermet for SOFC anode

Sentencas: The finer particles, either NiO or YSZ, were interlinked well by sintering and the electrical and mechanical properties of Ni-YSZ cermets were enhanced by the percolation of Ni and YSZ, respectively.
Titulo: Microstructural effects on the electrical and mechanical properties of Ni-YSZ cermet for SOFC anode
